channel.title: Need help with slayer and command that brings up
channel.description:
ok here this is how it is. i got a server from a dude but he has ruined the slayer. so can anybody help me with the hole slayer base ?.
+ i need help with the command were u just type for example ::rules and it brings up the rules on a paper. or for example ::commands and it brings up all the commands.
can anybody give me the code for that ?? :] i would be very glad !
